excerpt: "Beloved Batman actor Kevin Conroy has died at 66, Warner Bros. Discovery confirmed on Friday. Conroy voice-acted Batman in 15 films, plus hundreds of episodes of television and multiple video games, including the Batman: The Animated Series show and the Batman: Arkham games."
